notes.text: Pay attention to your drops, they affect Yuna's sphere grid below.

itemAcquisitionFlags.sourceDescription: Drop from Biran and Yenke (2 Return Spheres and 2 Friend Spheres).

itemAcquisitionFlags.sourceDescription: Drop from Biran and Yenke (0 Return Spheres and 4 Friend Spheres).
itemAcquisitionFlags.promptText: Did you get 0 Return Spheres and 4 Friend Spheres from Biran & Yenke?
